metadata.title: CVE-2023-32695 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: socket.io parser is a socket.io encoder and decoder written in JavaScriptcomplying with version 5 of socket.io-protocol. A specially craftedSocket.IO packet can trigger an uncaught exception on the Socket.IO server,thus killing the Node.js process. A patch has been released in version4.2.3.

criterions.comment: node-socket.io-parser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
